title: A Step-by-Step Guide to Drawing Ninjas

steps.title: Draw a circle for the ninja’s head.
steps.content: Draw a circle for the ninja’s head.

steps.title: Draw a square for the ninja’s body, directly under the base of the circle.
steps.content: Draw a square for the ninja’s body, directly under the base of the circle. Connect the square with the circle by overlapping a small portion.

steps.title: Draw pellet-like shapes for the ninja’s limbs (hands and legs).
steps.content: Draw pellet-like shapes for the ninja’s limbs (hands and legs). You may draw the limbs any way or any direction you like.

steps.title: Draw a small, horizontally-elongated oval inside the circle and within the oval draw the ninja’s eyes.
steps.content: Draw a small, horizontally-elongated oval inside the circle and within the oval draw the ninja’s eyes.

steps.title: Draw a slender rectangle representing a stick at the left-side connected to the ninja’s hands.
steps.content: Draw a slender rectangle representing a stick at the left-side connected to the ninja’s hands.

steps.title: Erase the overlapping parts that are unnecessary.
steps.content: Erase the overlapping parts that are unnecessary.

steps.title: Refine the lines and edges and add the details.
steps.content: Refine the lines and edges and add the details.

steps.title: Color to your heart’s content or add more ninjas!
steps.content: Color to your heart’s content or add more ninjas!

steps.title: Using pencil, roughly sketch the guidelines for drawing a ninja.
steps.content: Using pencil, roughly sketch the guidelines for drawing a ninja. Begin with a small circle with a cross-section for the ninja’s head.

steps.title: Draw an oval a little under the circle and draw a line from the circle through the oval and further; this will be for the backbone of a ninja’s body (for sketch purposes)
steps.content: Draw an oval a little under the circle and draw a line from the circle through the oval and further; this will be for the backbone of a ninja’s body (for sketch purposes)

steps.title: Draw two small circles at the upper left and upper right side of the oval.
steps.content: Draw two small circles at the upper left and upper right side of the oval. Draw an oval at the end of the line made in step 2. Draw 2 lines connecting the ovals a little before the side’s end.

steps.title: Draw two small vertically-elongated ovals from the 2 small circles at the upper oval for the ninja’s arms.
steps.content: Draw two small vertically-elongated ovals from the 2 small circles at the upper oval for the ninja’s arms. Draw 2 vertically-elongated ovals from the oval at the bottom end for the ninja’s legs.

steps.title: Extend the limbs by alternating small circles and vertically-elongated ovals.
steps.content: Extend the limbs by alternating small circles and vertically-elongated ovals. Make a distinction for the feet using smooth triangular shapes. You now have sketch for the body ready for adding some details for the eyes, ears, nose and mouth, body, clothes, and sword.

steps.title: Carefully trace with a pen the outline of your sketch.
steps.content: Carefully trace with a pen the outline of your sketch. The sketch will guide you to produce a smooth and neat outline. Trace the smaller details of the ninja to produce drawing effects for the clothes.

steps.title: Color the drawing as you like!
steps.content: Color the drawing as you like!
